title: An assemblage of thorns
description: Gaia is a country rich in history and horrors.Adaeze and her brother David have just lost their family to a raging fire and a honey haired man. Across the Millian sea, Folake is flung overboard and left to die in the raging waters. The three meet under strange circumstances and as a friendship grows between them, they soon discover that the fate of their world and everyone they love, rests limply on their shoulders.
author: Adedamola Abiodun
